metadata.Title: CVE-2022-40743 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description: Improper Input Validation vulnerability for the xdebug plugin in Apache Software Foundation Apache Traffic Server can lead to cross site scripting and cache poisoning attacks.This issue affects Apache Traffic Server: 9.0.0 to 9.1.3. Users should upgrade to 9.1.4 or later versions.

criterions.comment: trafficserver package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
